Cell ID 19, Band Band 26:
ANOMALY_DETECTED  
1. Cell ID 19, Band 26  
- Low RSRP: -111.17 dBm < -110 dBm
- Throughput Drop: 22.02 Mbps (Current) vs. 87.76 Mbps (Avg Prior 3) - drop > 50%
- Explanation: Low RSRP typically indicates poor radio conditions, possibly due to distance, interference, or physical obstructions. Throughput drop often relates to network congestion, misconfiguration, or hardware issues.  
- Recommended fix: Remediation: Modify antenna azimuth/downtilt to redistribute traffic. Use Load Balancing Features (e.g., A3/A5 offset tuning for HO). Tune Cell Individual Offsets (CIO) for better distribution. Refer to Baicells documentation (Section 7, Page 46)
